channel.title: J_Halim on Engineering journey
channel.description: Recent content in J_Halim on Engineering journey

item.title: Lessons from the The Art of War
item.description: Straightforward and Elegant ideas to conduct war The art of war is a military treatise written by almost a mythical figure from ancient China in the Spring and Autumn period (around 700-450 BCE) of ancient China. In it, Sun tzu breaks down the politics of war and its importance to thenation state. It is a short and easy read that I highly recommend to everyone. It took me 30 minutes to finish reading everything.

item.title: Do You Hear Me Now?
item.description: This is officially my “Can you hear me now ?" moment. Took me quite a while to figure out the nooks and cranny of setting up a web page to record down my engineering journey page using Hugo. I am almost done with my University / College education. I am just waiting for graduation ceremony now having completed all my courses and tests. In the mean time, I am embarking on a journey of life long self-learning.
